bilingual.source: It was very professional of the player to be so polite.

我需要一个专业的译文。
我们应该寻找专业的建议。

bilingual.source: I want to become a professional barista.

这项工作需要专业的调教。

list.abstract: professional，意译为“职业的，专业的”，常被许多软件产品作为后缀。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, great. Honey, then you're a professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好啊，亲爱的，这么说你也算专业的了。

yingyinNormal.en: The threat is so serious, he has to hire a professional to comb his fields every week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威胁太大了，他必须雇佣专业的人员来每周梳理他的田地。

yingyinNormal.en: To get a great crust on this loaf, a professional baking secret is to fill a trough in the bottom of the oven with water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了让面包很脆，一个很专业的秘诀是把烤箱下面的水槽里倒满水。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, how come you all get to be married and I have to stay single? I think that's a question for a licensed professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凭什么你们都结婚了就我一个人单身？这问题恐怕要专业的心理咨询师才能回答。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? What's she like? I mean a professional relationship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？对方人怎么样？我是说职业关系。

yingyinNormal.en: Professional employment? Fast food work? Temping, like Maggie? Any employment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与专业对口的工作？还是在快餐店打工？像玛姬那样的临时工？任何工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Lay down your weapon. You are a policeman, I'm a professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: “放下武器”。你们是警察，而我是职业杀手。我是要杀了你朋友的人。

yingyinNormal.en: At the same time in my professional life, someone did speak up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而在我的职业生涯中 确实有人无保留地说了出来。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Meet Jim, an aspiring professional trying to make it in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来认识一下Jim，一位有抱负的专业人员想要尝试着达到目标。

yingyinNormal.en: And because I'm a professional recording artist, I shouldn't do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我是一个职业的唱片歌手，我不可以这么做。

yingyinNormal.en: He couldn't have. Of course he could. It's easy enough for a professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不可能拿的。行家要拿还不容易吗?

yingyinNormal.en: It really was, this time last year, the worst period in my professional life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 的确，去年的这个时侯是我职业生涯的低谷。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the single greatest day of my professional career. Gunther. Six glasses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我职业生涯中最伟大的一天。冈瑟,，6个杯子。

yingyinNormal.en: No. You can't hire him, because that, it's not professional. This is for me, yes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，你不能雇用他，因为那么做太不专业了，这是给我的，对吧?

yingyinNormal.en: No, I respect your feedback. Thank you for being so professional about everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我尊重你的反馈，感谢你能表现得如此专业。

yingyinNormal.en: There is no question that you are a talented, dedicated, experienced professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人质疑这点，你是个天资卓越、爱岗敬业和经验丰富的专业人才。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have aspirations for a career, or a professional dream that you wish to pursue?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有没有想要从事的事业想要实现的职业梦想？

yingyinNormal.en: It would be nice if he could think of you as a friend rather than a paid professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他能把你当成朋友，而不只是护理人员最好。

yingyinNormal.en: You've had an acting job where you got paid? That is not the definition of professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有能赚钱的表演工作？这不是评判"专业"的标准。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you just give him to somebody else? No, I can handle it. No, I'm a professional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么不把他转给别人？我可以应付，我很专业。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 专业发展；职业发展；专业化发展

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: For example, many collegiate and <highlight>professional</highlight> football players qualify as obese, though their percentage body fat is low.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，许多大学和职业足球运动员都属于肥胖，尽管他们的体脂百分比很低。

examination_example.sentence: While seemingly innocent, this loss of mental focus can potentially have a damaging impact on our <highlight>professional</highlight>, social, and personal well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管看上去似乎无伤大雅，但这种精神不集中会潜在地对我们的职业、社会和个人幸福产生有害的影响。

examination_example.sentence: There were almost half a million <highlight>professional</highlight> social scientists from all fields in the world, working both inside and outside academia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有将近50万来自世界各个领域的专业社会科学家，在学术界内外工作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Professionals</highlight> trying to acquire new skills will be able to do so without going into debt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专业人士不用负债累累也可以尝试获取新技能了。

examination_example.sentence: If you're not sure, ask for honest feedback from trusted friends, colleagues and <highlight>professionals</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不确定，向你信任的朋友、同事和专业人士寻求诚实的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers, employers, and health <highlight>professionals</highlight> have been shown to harbor biases against the obese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师、雇主和医疗专业人士对肥胖者存有偏见。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 职业；诈称；表白；入教；职业人士；信仰的宣布；入教誓言；修道誓约；入教仪式

examination_example.sentence: Not so much the formal variety one obtains from a university but the informal variety that comes from credible work experience and <highlight>professional</highlight> accomplishments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不是指从大学中取得的那种正式资格，而是从可信的工作经验和专业成就中获得的非正式的能力。

examination_example.sentence: It fosters correct interpretation of <highlight>professional</highlight> writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它培养对专业写作的正确理解。

examination_example.sentence: Professor D. B. Dowd argues that we have misfiled the significance of drawing because we see it as a <highlight>professional</highlight> skill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: D. B. Dowd教授认为，我们误解了绘画的重要性，因为我们把它视为一种专业技能。

examination_example.sentence: Hiring <highlight>professionals</highlight> to navigate the whole process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇佣专业人士来指导整个过程。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to write like a <highlight>professional</highlight> without plagiarism (抄袭), there are a few lessons to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想像专业人士一样写作而不抄袭，有几点经验值得我们学习。

examination_example.sentence: A computer beat one of the world's leading <highlight>professional</highlight> Go players.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机打败了一名世界一流的职业围棋选手。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Other factors may also significantly influence a project's success, most notably, the size of a scientist's personal and <highlight>professional</highlight> networks, and how much a researcher promotes a project on their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他因素也可能对一个项目的成功产生重大影响，其中最重要的是，科学家的个人和专业网络的规模，以及一个研究员自己推动一个项目的程度。

examination_example.sentence: The American Trucking Association lists approximately 3.5 million <highlight>professional</highlight> truck drivers in the U.S.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国卡车协会(The American Trucking Association)列出了美国约350万名职业卡车司机。

examination_example.sentence: Building a neon sign is an art practiced by <highlight>professionals</highlight> trained on the job to mold glass tubes into decorative shapes and letters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制作霓虹灯牌是一门艺术，要把玻璃管塑造成装饰性的形状和字母，由受过培训的专业人士完成。

examination_example.sentence: Many companies now look to these "ultimate <highlight>professionals</highlight>" to solve problems their full-time teams can't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多公司现在指望这些“终极专业人员”来解决他们全职团队无法解决的问题。

examination_example.sentence: A group of educators, health <highlight>professionals</highlight> and childhood advocates called the loss of play in early childhood was a tragedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一群教育工作者、健康专业人士和儿童权益倡导者称，孩子们在幼年失去玩耍的机会是一场悲剧。

examination_example.sentence: According to some <highlight>professionals</highlight>, deprivation of young children's playtime will do harm not only to children themselves but to the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一些专业人士的观点，剥夺孩子们的玩耍时间不仅对孩子们自身有害，而且对国家也有害。

sense_info_list.en: having a job which needs special training and a high level of education

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>professional</highlight> women aim to do it all. They want to reach the top of the corporate ladder and fly like supermom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些职业女性的目标是做到这一切。他们想到达公司阶梯的顶端，像超级妈妈一样飞翔。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 职业运动员；专业运动员

examination_example.sentence: He decided to take training courses like a <highlight>professional</highlight> athlete (职业运动员).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他决定像职业运动员一样参加训练课程。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>professional</highlight> writer will give you more useful suggestions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专业作家会给你更多有用的建议。

examination_example.sentence: He finds it hard to be a <highlight>professional</highlight> basketball player.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现要成为一名职业篮球运动员很难。
